Source code for crefor.tests.guide

#!/usr/bin/env python

'''
'''

from maya import cmds
from crefor.model.guide.guide import Guide

import unittest


[docs]def create_guides():
    arm = Guide("C", "arm", 0).create()
    leg = Guide("C", "leg", 0).create()
    spine = Guide("C", "spine", 0).create()
    return (arm, leg, spine)



[docs]class TestGuide(unittest.TestCase):


[docs]    def setUp(self):
        '''Runs before each test'''
        cmds.file(newFile=True, force=True)



[docs]    def tearDown(self):
        '''Runs after each test'''
        pass



[docs]    def test_create_guide(self):
        arm, _, _ = create_guides()

        self.assertEquals(cmds.objExists(arm.joint), True, 'Guide does not exist: %s' % arm.name)



[docs]    def test_parent_guide(self):
        arm, leg, _ = create_guides()
        arm.set_parent(leg)

        self.assertIsNone(leg.parent)
        self.assertEquals(arm.parent.joint, leg.joint, '%s is not %s parent.' % (leg.joint, arm.joint))
        self.assertEquals(leg.children.values()[0].joint, arm.joint, '%s is not a child of %s' % (arm.joint, leg.joint))



[docs]    def test_child_guide(self):
        arm, leg, _ = create_guides()
        leg.add_child(arm)

        self.assertIsNone(leg.parent)
        self.assertEquals(arm.parent.joint, leg.joint, '%s is not %s parent.' % (leg.joint, arm.joint))
        self.assertEquals(leg.children.values()[0].joint, arm.joint, '%s is not a child of %s' % (arm.joint, leg.joint))




[docs]class TestGuideReinit(unittest.TestCase):

    POSITION = 'C'
    ARM = 'arm'
    LEG = 'leg'
    SPINE = 'spine'
    INDEX = 0


[docs]    def setUp(self):
        '''Runs before each test'''
        cmds.file(newFile=True, force=True)
        _, _, _ = create_guides()



[docs]    def tearDown(self):
        '''Runs after each test'''
        pass



[docs]    def test_reinit(self):
        '''Reinit a guide'''
        arm = Guide(self.POSITION, self.ARM, self.INDEX).reinit()

        self.assertIsInstance(arm, Guide, '%s not initialised correctly, got: %s' % (arm.joint, type(arm)))



[docs]    def test_parent(self):
        arm = Guide(self.POSITION, self.ARM, self.INDEX).reinit()
        leg = Guide(self.POSITION, self.LEG, self.INDEX).reinit()
        arm.set_parent(leg)

        self.assertIsNone(leg.parent)
        self.assertEquals(arm.parent.joint, leg.joint, '%s is not %s parent.' % (leg.joint, arm.joint))
        self.assertEquals(leg.children.values()[0].joint, arm.joint, '%s is not a child of %s' % (arm.joint, leg.joint))



[docs]    def test_child(self):
        arm = Guide(self.POSITION, self.ARM, self.INDEX).reinit()
        leg = Guide(self.POSITION, self.LEG, self.INDEX).reinit()
        leg.add_child(arm)

        self.assertIsNone(leg.parent)
        self.assertEquals(arm.parent.joint, leg.joint, '%s is not %s parent.' % (leg.joint, arm.joint))
        self.assertEquals(leg.children.values()[0].joint, arm.joint, '%s is not a child of %s' % (arm.joint, leg.joint))



[docs]    def test_child_then_parent(self):
        """Try set the child of top joint as its parent"""
        arm = Guide(self.POSITION, self.ARM, self.INDEX).reinit()
        leg = Guide(self.POSITION, self.LEG, self.INDEX).reinit()
        spine = Guide(self.POSITION, self.SPINE, self.INDEX).reinit()
        
        arm.set_parent(leg)
        leg.set_parent(spine)

        spine.set_parent(arm)

        self.assertIsNone(arm.parent)
        # self.assertEquals(spine.parent)



        # self.assertIsNone(leg.parent)
        # self.assertEquals(arm.parent.joint, leg.joint, '%s is not %s parent.' % (leg.joint, arm.joint))
        # self.assertEquals(leg.children.values()[0].joint, arm.joint, '%s is not a child of %s' % (arm.joint, leg.joint))
